name: OUTPATIENT OPHTHALMIC SURGERY SOCIETY, INC
description: Trade association for development and operation of ophthalmic ambulatory surgery centers
sampleDescriptions: Lobby for HR 1453 and S 2071, "The ASC Quality and Access Act of 2015", for reasonable payment and quality reporting rules for ambulatory surgical centers.
Lobbying for fair reimbursement and reasonable quality reporting and regulatory requirements for ambulatory surgical centers. Lobbying for HR 1453 and S 2071, "The ASC Quality and Access Act of 2015"
